entry.title: Current Conditions: 22.2°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Risk of a thundershower in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 21. Humidex 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
